OverviewÂ¶

Implementation

  • Python code. No IRAF dependencies
  • Runs where Python runs (in principle)
  • Needs Scipy, Matplotlib, ndimage and astrodata (a Gemini package)

The NICI reduction package consists of following commands:

ncqlook. Quick look and data quality assesment.

ncmark. Manually marks mask centers

ncprepare. Find masks center

ncmkflats. Create calibration files

ncscience. Analysis of science data

Command arguments

Each of the above commands can be issued using the Pyraf, Python or Unix shell. For examples see:

Running under Unix, Pyraf or Python
